name: Lost Island (hutchid6)
description:
If the Web version is laggy scroll to the bottom, download LostIslandDownloadBuild.zip , extract it and run the Unity application.

Programming/Implementation - Dalton Hutchinson

3D Modeling - Vincent  Terraneo

Story/Writing and Design - Rebecca Harris

Music and Sound - Chris

Almost fully controller compatible!  You just have to click to choose a text option sometimes.

Left Shift to run/roll  (circle on controller)

E to light attack (rb on controller)

R to heavy attack (rt on controller)

Q to interact (x on controller)
